 PLOT...........:

 The sequel to 2005&#039;s "Madagascar", in which New York Zoo animals, Alex
 the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still
 stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they
 land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family,
 but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the
 Central Park Zoo.
